messages.subject: Grandpa Nagakura is in the Simpsons!!!!
messages.msgSnippet: 1) this wasn t my idea 2) this person has contributed to the fanart page on SHQ.com and I know she is just playing around 3) the problem is she uses historical
messages.messageBody:
1) this wasn't my idea
2) this person has contributed to the fanart page on SHQ.com and I
know she is just playing around
3) the problem is she uses historical Nagakura's pic so I'm not going
to post on SHQ.com I sort of don't want to offend Japanese fans or
others out there
4) it IS hilarious (but I have really bad taste when it comes to humor)

check it out (she didn't sign it) X-D
http://1happyturtle.com/makoto/NagakuraandSimpsons.jpg

I LAUGHED UNTIL I CRIED WHEN I SAW IT---I'm a fan of the TV show
and lately I've been scribbling various movie reviews "Grandpa
Nagakura" may want to give---I want to turn into a short vid but it is
such a tedious process

ALOT of updates at http://www.shinsengumi.com click on 2006
I can't go back into the server right now but
Hirotada's Tokugawa fascinating examination of the Shinsengumi's
friend has also been added to
http://www.shinsengumihq.com/misc_facts.htm I forgot to post it on the
index page
